committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to extend the Federal Physicians Comparability Allowance Act of 1978, and for other purposes.
short_title: Federal Physicians Comparability Allowance Amendments of 1981

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Federal Physicians Comparability Allowance Amendments of 1981 - Extends the authority of Federal agencies to enter into service agreements providing comparability allowances for Government physicians. Requires that the redetermined annuity of an individual who is separated from Federal reemployment as a Presidential appointee be at least equal to the individual's original annuity plus the amount of any cost of living increases occurring during his or her reemployment.

titles.title: Federal Physicians Comparability Allowance Amendments of 1981
A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to extend the Federal Physicians Comparability Allowance Act of 1978, and for other purposes.
